items.name: Adrar Celestial Camp
items.short_description: Experience the magic of the Sahara under a blanket of stars at this premium eco-camp, featuring powerful telescopes, guided astronomy sessions, and traditional Mauritanian hospitality.
items.address: Route de Chinguetti, 15 km Est d'Atar

items.name: Atar Ksour Discovery Hub
items.short_description: An interactive museum and research center dedicated to the fascinating history, unique architecture, and ongoing preservation efforts of Mauritania's ancient Ksour cities.
items.address: Rue de l'Indépendance, Quartier Ancien, Atar

items.name: Desert Artisan Studio
items.short_description: Engage in hands-on workshops where visitors can learn traditional Mauritanian crafts like leatherwork, weaving, and sand painting directly from skilled local artisans.
items.address: Quartier El Jadid, near the Grand Mosquée, Atar

items.name: Palm Grove Serenity Retreat
items.short_description: A tranquil eco-friendly retreat nestled within a verdant oasis, offering traditional desert wellness practices, relaxation, and healthy, locally sourced cuisine for a rejuvenating escape.
items.address: Oasis de Azougui, 20 km Sud-Est d'Atar

items.name: Modern Atar Souk Extension
items.short_description: Discover a vibrant new wing of Atar's traditional souk, featuring an expanded selection of organic local produce, exotic spices, and a dedicated area for authentic Mauritanian street food vendors.
items.address: Adjacent to the Main Souk, Avenue Commerciale, Atar

items.name: Adrar Geopark Gateway
items.short_description: The official visitor center for the newly designated Adrar Geopark, offering interactive exhibits on regional geology, paleontology, and serving as the starting point for guided desert explorations.
items.address: Route de Ouadane, just outside Atar

items.name: Caravan Routes Experience
items.short_description: Embark on authentic multi-day camel trekking expeditions into the heart of the Adrar, complete with immersive Bedouin hospitality, traditional storytelling, and mesmerizing desert music under the stars.

items.name: Adrar Manuscripts Library
items.short_description: A newly established library and archive dedicated to the crucial task of preserving and showcasing ancient desert manuscripts, maps, and invaluable oral histories of the Adrar region.
items.address: Rue Cheikh El Guehd, Centre Ville, Atar

items.name: Atar Solar Innovation Hub
items.short_description: An educational center demonstrating cutting-edge sustainable desert living, showcasing advanced solar energy solutions, innovative water conservation techniques, and eco-friendly architectural designs.
items.address: Zone Industrielle Extension, Route de Nouakchott, Atar

items.name: Atar Horizons Youth Center
items.short_description: A vibrant community space fostering creativity and cultural exchange among local youth and visitors through art, music, language workshops, and collaborative projects.
items.address: Avenue Mohammed V, Quartier Central, Atar
